languages.text: Enabling this setting allows you to view the results of skill tests in dialogues. When your character performs a skill action, you will see whether it was successful and its consequences for the storyline. This helps you make informed decisions in dialogues and control the outcome of the game.
languages.original_text: Эта настройка позволяет видеть результаты проверок навыков в диалогах. Когда ваш персонаж совершает действие с выбранным навыком, вы увидите, успешно ли оно выполнено и какие последствия имеет на развитие сюжета. Это поможет вам принимать решения в диалогах и контролировать исход игры.

traits.locale_text: Enabling this setting allows you to view the results of skill tests in dialogues. When your character performs a skill action, you will see whether it was successful and its consequences for the storyline. This helps you make informed decisions in dialogues and control the outcome of the game.

Enabling this setting allows you to view the results of skill tests in dialogues. When your character performs a skill action, you will see whether it was successful and its consequences for the storyline. This helps you make informed decisions in dialogues and control the outcome of the game.

Enabling this setting allows you to view the results of skill tests in dialogues. When your character performs a skill action, you will see whether it was successful and its consequences for the storyline. This helps you make informed decisions in dialogues and control the outcome of the game.

languages.text: Эта настройка позволяет видеть результаты проверок навыков в диалогах. Когда ваш персонаж совершает действие с выбранным навыком, вы увидите, успешно ли оно выполнено и какие последствия имеет на развитие сюжета. Это поможет вам принимать решения в диалогах и контролировать исход игры.
languages.original_text: Enabling this setting allows you to view the results of skill tests in dialogues. When your character performs a skill action, you will see whether it was successful and its consequences for the storyline. This helps you make informed decisions in dialogues and control the outcome of the game.

languages.text: 启用此设置后，可以查看对话过程中的技能检定结果。当您的角色执行技能动作时，您可以看到该技能动作是否成功，以及对故事情节带来怎样的影响。这有助于你在对话中做出明智的决定，选择您希望的结果。
languages.original_text: Enabling this setting allows you to view the results of skill tests in dialogues. When your character performs a skill action, you will see whether it was successful and its consequences for the storyline. This helps you make informed decisions in dialogues and control the outcome of the game.

traits.locale_text: 启用此设置后，可以查看对话过程中的技能检定结果。当您的角色执行技能动作时，您可以看到该技能动作是否成功，以及对故事情节带来怎样的影响。这有助于你在对话中做出明智的决定，选择您希望的结果。

languages.text: この設定をオンにすると、ダイアログにスキル判定の結果を表示することができます。あなたのキャラクターがスキルアクションを行うと、それが成功したかどうかと、ストーリーへの影響を確認できます。これはダイアログであなたが情報に基づいて判断することやゲームの結果をコントロールするのに役に立ちます。
languages.original_text: Enabling this setting allows you to view the results of skill tests in dialogues. When your character performs a skill action, you will see whether it was successful and its consequences for the storyline. This helps you make informed decisions in dialogues and control the outcome of the game.

traits.locale_text: この設定をオンにすると、ダイアログにスキル判定の結果を表示することができます。あなたのキャラクターがスキルアクションを行うと、それが成功したかどうかと、ストーリーへの影響を確認できます。これはダイアログであなたが情報に基づいて判断することやゲームの結果をコントロールするのに役に立ちます。

languages.text: Activar este ajuste te permite ver los resultados de las pruebas de habilidad en los diálogos. Cuando tu personaje realiza una habilidad, verás si ha tenido éxito y sus consecuencias para la historia. Esto te permite tomar decisiones informadas en los diálogos y controlar el flujo del argumento.
languages.original_text: Enabling this setting allows you to view the results of skill tests in dialogues. When your character performs a skill action, you will see whether it was successful and its consequences for the storyline. This helps you make informed decisions in dialogues and control the outcome of the game.

traits.locale_text: Activar este ajuste te permite ver los resultados de las pruebas de habilidad en los diálogos. Cuando tu personaje realiza una habilidad, verás si ha tenido éxito y sus consecuencias para la historia. Esto te permite tomar decisiones informadas en los diálogos y controlar el flujo del argumento.

languages.text: Aktivieren dieser Einstellung ermöglicht das Einsehen der Ergebnisse von Fertigkeitsproben in Dialogen. Wenn dein Charakter eine Fertigkeit nutzt, siehst du, ob diese erfolgreich war und welche Konsequenzen dadurch für den Verlauf der Geschichte entstehen. Dadurch kannst du in Dialogen begründete Entscheidungen treffen und den Ausgang des Spiels kontrollieren.
languages.original_text: Enabling this setting allows you to view the results of skill tests in dialogues. When your character performs a skill action, you will see whether it was successful and its consequences for the storyline. This helps you make informed decisions in dialogues and control the outcome of the game.

traits.locale_text: Aktivieren dieser Einstellung ermöglicht das Einsehen der Ergebnisse von Fertigkeitsproben in Dialogen. Wenn dein Charakter eine Fertigkeit nutzt, siehst du, ob diese erfolgreich war und welche Konsequenzen dadurch für den Verlauf der Geschichte entstehen. Dadurch kannst du in Dialogen begründete Entscheidungen treffen und den Ausgang des Spiels kontrollieren.

languages.text: Lorsque ce paramètre est activé, les résultats des tests de compétence apparaissent dans les dialogues. Dès que votre personnage accomplit une action liée à une compétence, vous savez ainsi si elle est réussie ou non et quelles en sont les conséquences dans le scénario, ce qui vous permet de prendre des décisions éclairées au cours des dialogues et de contrôler l'issue du jeu.
languages.original_text: Enabling this setting allows you to view the results of skill tests in dialogues. When your character performs a skill action, you will see whether it was successful and its consequences for the storyline. This helps you make informed decisions in dialogues and control the outcome of the game.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque ce paramètre est activé, les résultats des tests de compétences apparaissent dans les dialogues. Dès que votre personnage accomplit une action liée à une compétence, vous savez ainsi si elle est réussie ou non et quelles en sont les conséquences dans le scénario, ce qui vous permet de prendre des décisions éclairées au cours des dialogues et de contrôler l'issue du jeu.

languages.text: Bu ayarı etkinleştirmek, diyaloglarda yetenek testlerinin sonuçlarına bakabilmeni sağlar. Karakterin bir yetenek eylemi gerçekleştirdiğinde eylemin başarılı olup olmadığını ve hikâye üzerindeki etkilerini görebilirsin. Bu sayede, diyaloglarda bilgiye dayalı kararlar verebilir ve oyunun akıbetini kontrol edebilirsin.
languages.original_text: Enabling this setting allows you to view the results of skill tests in dialogues. When your character performs a skill action, you will see whether it was successful and its consequences for the storyline. This helps you make informed decisions in dialogues and control the outcome of the game.
